module.name: Dashboard
module.description: Access the global runtime informations of the SmartFoxServer instance

module.name: Zone Monitor
module.description: Monitor SmartFoxServer Zones, Rooms and Users behavior at runtime, and live edit some of their settings

module.name: Analytics
module.description: Check the SmartFoxServer usage statistics from a business point of view

module.name: Ban Manager
module.description: Check banned users lists, cancel bannings and ban other users/IPs

module.name: Log Viewer
module.description: Check and download SmartFoxServer boot and runtime logs

module.name: BlueBox Monitor
module.description: Monitor clients connected through the BlueBox http tunnelling system

module.name: Server Configurator
module.description: Edit the global settings of the SmartFoxServer instance

module.name: Zone Configurator
module.description: Create and delete SmartFoxServer Zones and static Rooms, or edit the settings of the existing ones

module.name: Extension Manager
module.description: Upload Extension files to the SmartFoxServer instance

module.name: Servlet Manager
module.description: Upload servlets to SmartFoxServer instance's web server

module.name: License Manager
module.description: Configure the license of the SmartFoxServer instance
